item.title: IRS increases 2026 business mileage rate by 2.5 cents
item.description: The IRS announces an increase in the standard mileage rate for business use of vehicles

item.title: With the legendary Warren Buffett stepping back, Berkshire Hathaway enters a new era
item.description: Greg Abel faces the challenge of taking over Berkshire Hathaway from the legendary Warren Buffett this week

item.title: Asian shares follow Wall Street lower in final stretch of 2025
item.description: Wall Street is largely unchanged as trading for 2025 nudges closer to the finish line

item.title: Channel Tunnel disruption affects Eurostar and vehicle shuttle services between France and England
item.description: Power problems and a stuck train have interrupted rail traffic through the Channel Tunnel connecting the U.K. to continental Europe

item.title: German prosecutors will drop investigation of Russian magnate Usmanov upon payment of $11M fine
item.description: German prosecutors say they'll drop an investigation of Russian oligarch Alisher Usmanov over possible breaches of sanctions and money laundering rule...
